WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 07 MAR
   BY M/V SW EMPRESS TOWING 12 5556 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-55.13S 040-14.77W, 21-56.43S 039-37.75W,
   22-10.15S 039-37.75W, 22-23.82S 039-47.53W,
   22-31.50S 039-46.98W, 22-46.67S 039-53.75W,
   22-49.15S 039-56.60W, 22-34.27S 040-24.12W,
   22-19.43S 040-24.07W, 22-13.98S 040-20.02W,
   22-03.70S 040-20.75W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 08 MAR 22.
